content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <?xml-stylesheet href="figure2d.xsl" type="text/xsl" ?>  <figure2d>   <title>MMAB Sea Ice Concentration -- Southern Hemisphere high resolution</title>   <topic>sea ice concentration, coverage</topic>   <status>Operational</status>   <contact>Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov</contact>   <date>     <constructed cycle="00">18 March 2015  </constructed>    <valid time="00">18 March 2015  </valid>  </date>   <parameters>     <parm>Sea Ice Concentration</parm>   </parameters>   <depth>Surface</depth>   <graphic source="sh12.gif"/>   <full>sh12.html</full>   <return>     <page>Analyses.html</page>     <text>Main Ice Analysis Page</text>   </return>   <return>     <page>index.html</page>     <text>Main Sea Ice Page</text>   </return>    <domain2d>     <title>Definition of Global Display Grids</title>     <topic>Display, domains, grids</topic>     <status>Operational</status>     <date>10 March 2004</date>     <contact>Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov</contact>      <name>Southern Hemisphere</name>     <projection>Polar Stereographic</projection>     <area>76.9e6 km^2</area>     <resolution>12.7 km</resolution>     <bounds>       <loc lat="-36.90" lon="-220.19"/>       <loc lat="-37.80" lon="-120.76"/>       <loc lat="-31.09" lon="-307.14"/>       <loc lat="-31.85" lon="-31.88"/>     </bounds>   </domain2d>  </figure2d>
